lines.text:
[to a chained-up Marc]
I want to know just how long it takes before you tell me everything. And you will tell me everything.
How can you throw the rules in my face when a man is in danger?

[pointing to prison-cell window]
You climb up there when you have to take a leak, and when you have to take a crap, you crap on a piece of newspaper and then you wrap it up in the newspaper and you fling it outside the window.
Go to the mosque and kill the prisoner.
